Layal has two irreplaceable things - talent and passion.  She got involved with TEDxScottsdale's inaugural event with less than a month to go, took masterful control of our social media efforts, then jumped in and redesigned our print collateral materials at the 11th hour.  The event's overall success is in no small measure a function of Layal's last minute contributions.  I hope to work with her on future projects.

Layal was a dedicated and enthusiastic student in the Social Justice and Human Rights program at Arizona State University. Having preceded me by a semester, she helped me a great deal by introducing me to various professors and providing excellent advice. We worked together on a number of projects and I always found Layal to be creative, hardworking and flexible. Her expertise with technology and social media proved lifesaving at times, and she was always able to lighten the mood during moments of great stress. Layal would be an asset to any organization as she would bring humor, expertise and dedication to any project she set her mind to.
